divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting out side looking for shooting stars when i noticed a star that appeared to be moving i thought at first i thought i was seeing things so i closed my eyes for about 10 seconds and the moving object was not in the same area as i first saw it..i got my wife and she witnessed it also she has never seen a shooting star so she wrote it off as just that i told her shooting stars dont appear like that.. my mother inlaw was also out side looking for shooting stars ( she lives 30 min from us ) and she stated she saw the same thing i did..
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Merrillville
There were no other sightings in Merrillville on or around August 11th 2007
